Text: don't get this version, if you want it in English. I would love this guy if he fixed the english audio. The hindi sounds wonderful, BUT ENGLISH AUDIO IS CRAPPY. video quality most likely is around 720 p though. WANNA LEARN SPACE HINDI? DOWNLOAD haha.
